definition: to rotate/to twirl/to run around/to encircle/rotation/(coll.) to speak indirectly/to beat about the bush
see 轉文|转文[zhuai3 wen2]
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to confine/to lock up/to pen in
pen (pig)/a fold
circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle

sentences.english: Raise your arms, jump up, sit down, turn around, and shake your body.
sentences.chinese: 举起胳膊，跳起来，坐下，转圈，晃动身体。

sentences.english: Knut then walked in circles until he fell into the water.
sentences.chinese: 然后他走路转圈直到落水。

sentences.english: For a foreigner, the practice of surrounding toasts here can be embarrassing.
sentences.chinese: 在外国人看来，这里转圈敬酒的习俗颇令人尴尬。

sentences.english: Bellowing, circling, head pressing & maniacal excitement.
sentences.chinese: 吼叫，转圈，前冲和狂躁兴奋。

sentences.english: Minmei: Well the only compass I have ever seen was for drawing circles.
sentences.chinese: 而且，我唯一见过的指南针是在不断转圈的。

sentences.english: and I taught them how to brush their teeth in tiny circles so they wouldn't get cavities.
sentences.chinese: 教他们如何用牙刷转圈儿刷牙以免得蛀牙。

sentences.english: We tell jokes and I swing the little kids around.
sentences.chinese: 我们一起讲笑话，拽着小孩子的胳膊转圈儿。

sentences.english: Squeeze Gerber Toddler Tooth & Gum Cleanser onto bristles of toothbrush. Use small circular brushing motion to help remove food and plaque.
sentences.chinese: 将牙膏挤到刷毛上，用转圈圈的手势洗擦食品残留。

sentences.english: He started to sing and to dance the tarantella.
sentences.chinese: 他开始一边唱歌，一边转圈跳起舞来了。

sentences.english: They spin and they tumble. They bounce on the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 它们转圈，翻跟头，在微风中弹跳。

sentences.english: The brig is heaving around on the anchor.
sentences.chinese: 双桅横帆船围着锚转圈。

sentences.english: His laps around the dining room table are made at dizzying speed.
sentences.chinese: 它绕着餐桌转圈撒欢儿的速度让人看得直眼晕。

sentences.english: The skater spun round and round on the ice.
sentences.chinese: 滑冰者在冰上快速转圈。

definition: to rove around/to run around in circles/to walk back and forth
to rotate/to revolve/to spin/to whirl
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
to turn sth around/to swivel
to hop/to jump
to spin/to rotate/to revolve
to revolve
to turn a somersault
to make a round trip/return journey/back and forth/to and fro/repeatedly
to shake/to fling one's arm/to lash/to swing
to sway/to rock
to swing/to sway/to wobble/to hang around/to hover around
to flee in disarray/to scatter
to step on/to tread on/to wear (shoes)/(slang) to dump (sb)/Taiwan pr. [deng4]
to rock/to shake/to sway
to turn a somersault
hands dance and feet trip (idiom); dancing and gesticulating for joy
